::Cleder/Rixer/Forrior/Blyer/Firearm/Hot Rod::

They all gaze up at the gestalt Radistor.
"Oh, jeez. Things just got a little tougher," said Hot Rod.
"Gemeni Dragon, you fight Radistor, and we'll try to help out, by
striking him with our weapons," says Cleder.

They all aim their weapons at Radistor, and open continues fire.
